Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [taking off and turning left. again turning right and coming down near a building. turning left and going straight. reaching top of the building. turning right and slightly coming down to the sea level. going straight and slight right turn. passing in between buildings and slight right turn and going straight.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. In terms of next steps, what is the best next step for you?  
choose:  
A. I go up and turn right.  
B. I descend and fly forward.  
C. I fly forward while rotating the camera downward.  
D. I turn left and go up.  
E. I turn right and fly forward.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: D; Reason: The navigation instruction starts with "taking off and turning left," which implies that the initial action should be to ascend (go up) and then make a left turn. Among the given options, "I turn left and go up" (Option D) aligns with this initial step of the instructions.
